RightParserResult.Subject: RE: RE: RE: avs4you
RightParserResult.TextBody:
Thanks for confirming Galina. I will look into the current Q4 rates and expected volumes for these territories.
And in order to ensure that we are fully aware of the functionalities and behavior of each software, I would be grateful if you could complete the attached templates. It shouldn’t take more than a few minutes and it will provide us with all the information we need to make this campaign work.
Thanks,
Richard
Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<mailto:richard.cottrell@softonic.com>
[Description: pp]<http://www.softonic.com/>
http://www.softonic.com Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN) Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292 Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013

Any unauthorized copying, disclosure or distribution of the material in this e-mail is strictly forbidden.
From: Galina Medvedeva [mailto:galina.medvedeva@avs4you.com] Sent: martes, 22 de octubre de 2013 14:04 To: Richard Cottrell Subject: Re: RE: RE: avs4you
Hello, Richard
We are looking to increase sales of AVS products in the USA, France, Germany, Australia, United Kingdom, Canada and Italy.
Best regards, Galina Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd. www.avs4you.com<http://www.avs4you.com>
10/22/2013 14:03:10, "Richard Cottrell" <richard.cottrell@softonic.com<mailto:richard.cottrell@softonic.com>>: Hi Galina,
Can you confirm across which markets you are looking to increase sales of your products (AVS Video Converter and AVS Video Editor) in the next 3 months.
Once I know I can put together a tailored proposal for you together with further information on these recommendations.
Many thanks,
Richard
Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<mailto:richard.cottrell@softonic.com>
<http://www.softonic.com/>

<http://www.softonic.com/> From: Galina Medvedeva [mailto:galina.medvedeva@avs4you.com] Sent: jueves, 17 de octubre de 2013 6:36 To: Richard Cottrell Subject: Re: RE: avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/>
Hello, Richard
Sorry for the delay with the response.
All I know about our previous projects is that they were very expensive and had a few sales. That's all metrics I have)
As for the objectives for Q4, the time of holidays is close and we've already started working on different promotions. The goal is to increase sales of our products greatly the next 3 months. The products I want to focus on are AVS Video Converter and AVS Video Editor. We can consider any advertising budget if the proposal is profitable and interesting for us.
We have some ads on Softonic, as a part of our Adwords campaign. But for the year 2013 we have only 5 sales from your website. So I'm very interested in creating an advertising campaign that will work. Choosing one of the Advertising Opportunities, which you present on Softonic website, I would like to learn more information about: - Softonic Display Ads (are pages of Softonic website and positions of ads the same as in Google display network?) - Softonic Video Advertising - Softonic Custom Programs (customization of the campaign on the international Softonic sites)
If I've missed something or you have better ideas for our products, I'm ready to consider.
Best regards, Galina Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd. www.avs4you.com<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/>
10/16/2013 15:23:05, "Richard Cottrell" <richard.cottrell@softonic.com>:<http://www.softonic.com/> Hi Galina,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Are you free today to jump on a call and go through the opportunities in more detail?<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> If you have any specific requirements and objectives for Q4 (markets, targeting requirements, dates, etc.) that you can share with me then I can speed up the process by putting together a detailed proposal.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Regards,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<http://www.softonic.com/>

<http://www.softonic.com/> From: Richard Cottrell Sent: viernes, 11 de octubre de 2013 14:28 To: 'Galina Medvedeva' Subject: RE: avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Hi Galina,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Nice to “e-meet” you and thanks for getting back to me.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> As mentioned to Irina, we’ve made notable improvements to our download tool both in terms of the offer screen layout as well as the targeting technology we can implement in order to engage with the right audience and drive higher take rates.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> With regards to digital display solutions (banners, recommended contextual ads, video, etc.), we have also introduced more advertising formats and targeting capabilities.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> I was not responsible for working on your previous campaign therefore I don’t know what metrics you were using and why perhaps it wasn’t “successful”. However, I think the focus now should be to begin talking around what your objectives for Q4 are and what changes you have made internally regarding the business model and products, that way I will be in a better position to make the rightrecommendations for you. <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Perhaps you can send me further information as well as examples of the product(s) you would like to focus on. We can set up a call next week and go through this if that would help.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> I look forward to hearing from you and hope you have a great weekend,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<http://www.softonic.com/>

<http://www.softonic.com/> From: Galina Medvedeva [mailto:galina.medvedeva@avs4you.com] Sent: jueves, 10 de octubre de 2013 10:55 To: Richard Cottrell Subject: avs4you Importance: High<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Hello Richard,
My name is Galina and since today I am the one who is responsible for any communications with Softonic. Answer me for this e-mail address, please.
First of all let me inform you that we tried Softonic Downloader and some ad campaigns in the past. These campaigns were not very succesful.
I've read your letters and the advertising section on a Softonic website. But I'm not quite understand if you suggest us something or just inform about your updates. Still I'm interested in further negotiations and in starting new advertising campaign which differs from what we've tried before.
Best regards, Galina Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd. www.avs4you.com<http://www.softonic.com/> 10/03/2013 14:56:32, "Irina Sanaeva" <Irina.Sanaeva@avs4you.com>:<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> ----- Original Message ----- <http://www.softonic.com/> From: Richard Cottrell<http://www.softonic.com/> To: Irina Sanaeva<http://www.softonic.com/> Sent: Wednesday, October 02, 2013 4:54 PM<http://www.softonic.com/> Subject: RE: avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Hi Irina,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Many thanks for confirming.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> As mentioned previously, the opportunities to strengthen AVS’s product distribution and monetization models across the Softonic Network are vast. As the #1 multiplatform software guide worldwide, Softonic provides a community built around one of the largest online catalogues of software, applications and web/mobile apps combined with localized expert editorial analysis and reviews in 20 different languages. In short: we provide independent software vendors and advertisers alike with truly global reach, local scalability and access to a highly loyal and tech-savvy audience. Here are some additional facts which I’m certain will be of interest:<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Softonic is now the Top 34th internet site worldwide with over 128 million UUs per month serving 5.9 million downloads per day (comScore, Aug 2013). <http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Worldwide, Softonic is already 84% bigger than its closest competitor CNET Downloads (this is just regarding Desktop, it does not include Mobile).<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Softonic’s highest indexing audience profiles include Computers & Technology, Online Media, Telecommunications, Retail and Education.<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Advertising solutions include standard display banners, rich media, video, mobile, custom programs, performance and email marketing.<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Pricing models include CPM, CPC and CPD.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> I’ve attached a summarized presentation for you which explains Softonic’s value proposition, market insights and our advertising solutions. <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> An important and recent developments I wanted to bring to your attention was regarding Softonic’s Downloader Tool. As you’ll probably remember, this is a very unique tool independent from the website that guarantees download availability, speed, and security. It also shows display advertisement and Software Offers, tailored to the users who download software from our site.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> The new layout presents small but significant changes, some of which include:<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Bigger window size<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Bigger fonts (and improved readability)<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Better separation between content and navigation<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü Bigger and clear space for “Recommended Offers”<http://www.softonic.com/>
ü A modern look & feel<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Apart for the improved user experience, the new design will allow for better control over the offer screen, with more space and customization options. Additional benefit for our clients running SD campaigns: there is no need to change anything on the campaign offer screen, as the bigger screen and the previous QA testing allows all current campaigns to run with no need for modifications.<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Mockups offer screen full HTML:<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> There is plenty of information here so please shout should you have any questions or concerns. <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> I look forward to hearing from you shortly and hopefully moving ahead in October with a test campaign. <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Kind regards,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<http://www.softonic.com/>
http://www.softonic.com Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN) Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292 <http://www.softonic.com/> Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013<http://www.softonic.com/>
This e-mail (and any attached files) may contain confidential and/or privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient (or have received this e-mail in error) please notify the sender immediately and destroy this e-mail. Any unauthorized copying, disclosure or distribution of the material in this e-mail is strictly forbidden.<http://www.softonic.com/>
<http://www.softonic.com/> From: Irina Sanaeva [mailto:Irina.Sanaeva@avs4you.com] Sent: martes, 01 de octubre de 2013 14:19 To: Richard Cottrell Subject: avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Hello Richard,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> I confirm that Online Media Technologies Ltd. is located in UK . Here is our address:<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> • 29 Harley Street • London W1G 9QR • United Kingdom • Phone: (44) 208 144 3359 (no phone support) • Fax: (44) 207 182 6722<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Looking forward to your reply,<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Best regards, Irina Sanaeva Senior Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd. www.avs4you.com Follow us on Twitter www.twitter.com/avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> ----- Original Message ----- <http://www.softonic.com/> From: Richard Cottrell <http://www.softonic.com/> To: Irina Sanaeva <http://www.softonic.com/> Sent: Tuesday, October 01, 2013 11:59 AM<http://www.softonic.com/> Subject: RE: avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Hi Irina,<http://www.softonic.com/> There have been considerable developments and improvements regarding our download tool and display solutions, resulting in very positive results for our clients. <http://www.softonic.com/> Before sending you more detailed information, can you confirm you location? The reason I ask is that, due to internal policy, if you are not physically based in the UK then I will need to refer you to one of my senior colleagues.<http://www.softonic.com/> Let me know and we will be sure to follow up with insights into our advertising opportunities.<http://www.softonic.com/> Regards,<http://www.softonic.com/> Richard<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<http://www.softonic.com/>
http://www.softonic.com Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN) Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292 <http://www.softonic.com/> Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013<http://www.softonic.com/>

From: Irina Sanaeva [mailto:Irina.Sanaeva@avs4you.com] Sent: viernes, 27 de septiembre de 2013 13:04 To: Richard Cottrell Subject: avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> Hello Richard,<http://www.softonic.com/> I am contacting you on behalf of Online Media Technologies Ltd. We collaborated with Softonic in the past but unfortunately the last campaings were not successful. <http://www.softonic.com/> Could you please explain via email what advertising opportunities you can offer us? The more information you could provide the better. Thank you in advance!<http://www.softonic.com/> Best regards, Irina Sanaeva Senior Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd. www.avs4you.com Follow us on Twitter www.twitter.com/avs4you<http://www.softonic.com/> ----- Original Message ----- <http://www.softonic.com/> From: Richard Cottrell <http://www.softonic.com/> To: sales@avs4you.com <http://www.softonic.com/> Cc: info@avs4you.com <http://www.softonic.com/> Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2013 6:10 PM<http://www.softonic.com/> Subject: Softonic International - advertising opportunities (Online Media Technologies Ltd)<http://www.softonic.com/> ATT: Head of Sales & Marketing / Business Development <http://www.softonic.com/> Good afternoon,<http://www.softonic.com/> I was looking to speak with the person(s) responsible at AVS4YOU for your global distribution and sales to discuss possible business synergies. Please continue reading as the information below will be very relevant in terms of helping with your company’s online media strategy, distribution model and driving global awareness of your numerous Video/Audio/Image & Miscellaneous software product.<http://www.softonic.com/> To serve as a brief introduction, Softonic (www.softonic.com) is the #1 multiplatform software guide worldwide, a global community built around one of the largest online catalogues of software, games, applications and web/mobile apps combined with localized expert editorial analysis, articles and reviews in 20 languages. In short: we provide our partners with truly global reach, local scalability and access to a loyal, savvy audience that has trusted our brand for over 15 years. Here are a few additional facts:<http://www.softonic.com/>
Ø Softonic is now the Top 34th internet site worldwide with over 130 million UUs per month serving 5.9 million downloads per day (comScore, Aug 2013). <http://www.softonic.com/>
Ø Worldwide, Softonic is already 83% bigger than its closest competitor CNET Downloads (this is just regarding Desktop, it does not include Mobile).<http://www.softonic.com/>
Ø Softonic’s highest indexing audience profiles include Computers & Technology, Online Media, Telecommunications, Retail and Education.<http://www.softonic.com/>
Ø Advertising solutions include standard display banners, rich media, video, mobile, custom programs, performance and email marketing.<http://www.softonic.com/>
Ø Pricing models include CPM, CPC and CPD.<http://www.softonic.com/> I believe there are numerous opportunities here for AVS4YOU to strengthen its monetization and distribution models versus your direct competitors, and to showcase your products on a leading network and unique canvas. Nevertheless, before exploring in more detail the benefits of our proprietary solutions it would be best to schedule a meeting with yourself provided there is an interest of course.
I look forward to hearing from you. <http://www.softonic.com/> Kind regards,<http://www.softonic.com/> Richard<http://www.softonic.com/> <http://www.softonic.com/> Richard Cottrell Regional Sales Manager UK richard.cottrell@softonic.com<http://www.softonic.com/>
http://www.softonic.com Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN) Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292 <http://www.softonic.com/> Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013<http://www.softonic.com/>

RightParserResult.HtmlBody:
Thanks for confirming Galina. I will look into the current Q4 rates and expected volumes for these territories.

 

And in order to ensure that we are fully aware of the functionalities and behavior of each software, I would be grateful if you could complete the attached templates. It shouldn’t take more than a few minutes and it will provide us with all the information we need to make this campaign work.

 

Thanks,

 

 

Richard  

 

Richard Cottrell
Regional Sales Manager UK
richard.cottrell@softonic.com

http://www.softonic.com
Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN)
Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292   

Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013

This e-mail (and any attached files) may contain confidential and/or privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient (or have received this e-mail in error) please notify the sender immediately and destroy this e-mail. Any unauthorized copying, disclosure or distribution of the material in this e-mail is strictly forbidden.

 

From: Galina Medvedeva [mailto:galina.medvedeva@avs4you.com]
Sent: martes, 22 de octubre de 2013 14:04
To: Richard Cottrell
Subject: Re: RE: RE: avs4you

 

Hello, Richard

We are looking to increase sales of AVS products in the USA, France, Germany, Australia, United Kingdom, Canada and Italy. 

Best regards, Galina
Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd.
www.avs4you.com

10/22/2013 14:03:10, "Richard Cottrell" <richard.cottrell@softonic.com>:

Hi Galina,

 

Can you confirm across which markets you are looking to increase sales of your products (AVS Video Converter and AVS Video Editor) in the next 3 months.

 

Once I know I can put together a tailored proposal for you together with further information on these recommendations.

 

Many thanks,

 

 

Richard

 

Richard Cottrell
Regional Sales Manager UK
richard.cottrell@softonic.com

http://www.softonic.com
Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN)
Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292   

Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013

If you are not the intended recipient (or have received this e-mail in error) please notify the sender immediately and destroy this e-mail. Any unauthorized copying, disclosure or distribution of the material in this e-mail is strictly forbidden.

 

From: Galina Medvedeva [mailto:galina.medvedeva@avs4you.com]
Sent: jueves, 17 de octubre de 2013 6:36
To: Richard Cottrell
Subject: Re: RE: avs4you

 

Hello, Richard

Sorry for the delay with the response.

All I know about our previous projects is that they were very expensive and had a few sales. That's all metrics I have)

As for the objectives for Q4, the time of holidays is close and we've already started working on different promotions. The goal is to increase sales of our products greatly the next 3 months. The products I want to focus on are AVS Video Converter and AVS Video Editor. We can consider any advertising budget if the proposal is profitable and interesting for us.

We have some ads on Softonic, as a part of our Adwords campaign. But for the year 2013 we have only 5 sales from your website. So I'm very interested in creating an advertising campaign that will work.
Choosing one of the Advertising Opportunities, which you present on Softonic website, I would like to learn more information about:
- Softonic Display Ads (are pages of Softonic website and positions of ads the same as in Google display network?)
- Softonic Video Advertising
- Softonic Custom Programs (customization of the campaign on the international Softonic sites)

If I've missed something or you have better ideas for our products, I'm ready to consider.

Best regards, Galina
Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd.
www.avs4you.com

 

10/16/2013 15:23:05, "Richard Cottrell" <richard.cottrell@softonic.com>:

Hi Galina,

 

Are you free today to jump on a call and go through the opportunities in more detail?

 

If you have any specific requirements and objectives for Q4 (markets, targeting requirements, dates, etc.) that you can share with me then I can speed up the process by putting together a detailed proposal.

 

Regards,

 

 

Richard

 

Richard Cottrell
Regional Sales Manager UK
richard.cottrell@softonic.com

http://www.softonic.com
Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN)
Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292   

Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013

This e-mail (and any attached files) may contain confidential and/or privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient (or have received this e-mail in error) please notify the sender immediately and destroy this e-mail. Any unauthorized copying, disclosure or distribution of the material in this e-mail is strictly forbidden.

 

From: Richard Cottrell
Sent: viernes, 11 de octubre de 2013 14:28
To: 'Galina Medvedeva'
Subject: RE: avs4you

 

Hi Galina,

 

Nice to “e-meet” you and thanks for getting back to me.

 

As mentioned to Irina, we’ve made notable improvements to our download tool both in terms of the offer screen layout as well as the targeting technology we can implement in order to engage with the right audience and drive higher take rates.

 

With regards to digital display solutions (banners, recommended contextual ads, video, etc.), we have also introduced more advertising formats and targeting capabilities.

 

I was not responsible for working on your previous campaign therefore I don’t know what metrics you were using and why perhaps it wasn’t “successful”. However, I think the focus now should be to begin talking around what your objectives for Q4 are and what changes you have made internally regarding the business model and products, that way I will be in a better position to make the rightrecommendations for you.

 

Perhaps you can send me further information as well as examples of the product(s) you would like to focus on. We can set up a call next week and go through this if that would help.

 

I look forward to hearing from you and hope you have a great weekend,

 

 

Richard

 

 

Richard Cottrell
Regional Sales Manager UK
richard.cottrell@softonic.com

http://www.softonic.com
Edificio Meridian C/ Rosselló i Porcel, 21, planta 17 - 08016 Barcelona (SPAIN)
Tel+34 936 012 700 Fax+34 933 969 292   

Award winning company Great Place to Work 2013

This e-mail (and any attached files) may contain confidential and/or privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient (or have received this e-mail in error) please notify the sender immediately and destroy this e-mail. Any unauthorized copying, disclosure or distribution of the material in this e-mail is strictly forbidden.

 

From: Galina Medvedeva [mailto:galina.medvedeva@avs4you.com]
Sent: jueves, 10 de octubre de 2013 10:55
To: Richard Cottrell
Subject: avs4you
Importance: High

 

Hello Richard,

My name is Galina and since today I am the one who is responsible for any communications with Softonic. Answer me for this e-mail address, please.

First of all let me inform you that we tried Softonic Downloader and some ad campaigns in the past. These campaigns were not very succesful.

I've read your letters and the advertising section on a Softonic website. But I'm not quite understand if you suggest us something or just inform about your updates. Still I'm interested in further negotiations and in starting new advertising campaign which differs from what we've tried before.


Best regards, Galina
Marketing Manager, Online Media Technologies Ltd.
www.avs4you.com

10/03/2013 14:56:32, "Irina Sanaeva" <Irina.Sanaeva@avs4you.com>:

 

----- Original Message -----

From: Richard Cottrell

To: Irina Sanaeva

Sent: Wednesday, October 02, 2013 4:54 PM

Subject: RE: avs4you

 

Hi Irina,

 

Many thanks for confirming.

 

As mentioned previously, the opportunities to strengthen AVS’s product distribution and monetization models across the Softonic Network are vast. As the #1 multiplatform software guide worldwide, Softonic provides a community built around one of the largest online catalogues of software, applications and web/mobile apps combined with localized expert editorial analysis and reviews in 20 different languages. In short: we provide independent software vendors and advertisers alike with truly global reach, local scalability and access to a highly loyal and tech-savvy audience. Here are some additional facts which I’m certain will be of interest:

 

ü  Softonic is now the Top 34th internet site worldwide with over 128 million UUs per month serving 5.9 million downloads per day (comScore, Aug 2013).

ü  Worldwide, Softonic is already 84% bigger than its closest competitor CNET Downloads (this is just regarding Desktop, it does not include Mobile).

ü  Softonic’s highest indexing audience profiles include Computers & Technology, Online Media, Telecommunications, Retail and Education.

ü  Advertising solutions include standard display banners, rich media, video, mobile, custom programs, performance and email marketing.

ü  Pricing models include CPM, CPC and CPD.

 

I’ve attached a summarized presentation for you which explains Softonic’s value proposition, market insights and our advertising solutions.

 

An important and recent developments I wanted to bring to your attention was regarding Softonic’s Downloader Tool. As you’ll probably remember, this is a very unique tool independent from the website that guarantees download availability, speed, and security. It also shows display advertisement and Software Offers, tailored to the users who download software from our site.

 

The new layout presents small but significant changes, some of which include:

 

ü  Bigger window size

ü  Bigger fonts (and improved readability)

ü  Better separation between content and navigation

ü  Bigger and clear space for “Recommended Offers”

ü  A modern look & feel

 

Apart for the improved user experience, the new design will allow for better control over the offer screen, with more space and customization options. Additional benefit for our clients running SD campaigns:  there is no need to change anything on the campaign offer screen, as the bigger screen and the previous QA testing allows all current campaigns to run with no need for modifications.

 

Mockups offer screen full HTML:

 

   

 

There is plenty of information here so please shout should you have any questions or concerns.  

 

I look forward to hearing from you shortly and hopefully moving ahead in October with a test campaign.  

 

Kind regards,

 

 

Richard

ATT: Head of Sales & Marketing / Business Development

Good afternoon,

I was looking to speak with the person(s) responsible at AVS4YOU for your global distribution and sales to discuss possible business synergies. Please continue reading as the information below will be very relevant in terms of helping with your company’s online media strategy, distribution model and driving global awareness of your numerous Video/Audio/Image & Miscellaneous software product.

To serve as a brief introduction, Softonic (www.softonic.com) is the #1 multiplatform software guide worldwide, a global community built around one of the largest online catalogues of software, games, applications and web/mobile apps combined with localized expert editorial analysis, articles and reviews in 20 languages. In short: we provide our partners with truly global reach, local scalability and access to a loyal, savvy audience that has trusted our brand for over 15 years. Here are a few additional facts:

Ø  Softonic is now the Top 34th internet site worldwide with over 130 million UUs per month serving 5.9 million downloads per day (comScore, Aug 2013).

Ø  Worldwide, Softonic is already 83% bigger than its closest competitor CNET Downloads (this is just regarding Desktop, it does not include Mobile).

Ø  Softonic’s highest indexing audience profiles include Computers & Technology, Online Media, Telecommunications, Retail and Education.

Ø  Advertising solutions include standard display banners, rich media, video, mobile, custom programs, performance and email marketing.

Ø  Pricing models include CPM, CPC and CPD.

I believe there are numerous opportunities here for AVS4YOU to strengthen its monetization and distribution models versus your direct competitors, and to showcase your products on a leading network and unique canvas. Nevertheless, before exploring in more detail the benefits of our proprietary solutions it would be best to schedule a meeting with yourself provided there is an interest of course.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,

Richard
